get.description: Get links to all the JSON schemas by Cloudlet type (`cloudletCode`) to validate different requests used with this API. See [List Cloudlets](ref:get-cloudlets) for information on how to obtain the `cloudletCode`.

parameters.description: The two- or three- letter code of the Cloudlet you want to view all schemas for. This value corresponds to the `cloudletCode` member available from [List Cloudlets](ref:get-cloudlets).
parameters.name: cloudletType

schemas.title: EDGE REDIRECTOR MATCH RULE
schemas.description: applied to create/update match rule requests for ER cloudlets, where requests are of the form: POST|PUT /api/v2/policies/{policyId}/versions/{versionId}/rules/{ruleId}

schemas.title: CREATE/CLONE POLICY VERSION
schemas.description: applied to create/clone policy version requests of form: POST /policies/{policyId}/versions
schemas.additionalDescription: applied to policy version requests for ER cloudlets

schemas.title: UPDATE POLICY VERSION
schemas.description: applied to update policy version requests of form: PUT /policies/{policyId}/versions/{versionId}
schemas.additionalDescription: applied to policy version requests for ER cloudlets

schemas.title: CREATE POLICY
schemas.description: applied to requests to create policies of the form: POST /cloudlets/api/v2/policies

schemas.title: UPDATE POLICY
schemas.description: applied to all requests to update policies of the form: PUT /cloudlets/api/v2/policies/{policyId}

schemas.title: CLONE POLICY
schemas.description: applied to requests to clone policies of the form: POST /cloudlets/api/v2/policies?clonePolicyId=***

Returns the JSON schemas available for this API. Available schemas include `create-policy.json`, `update-policy.json`, `clone-policy.json`, `create-nimbus_policy_version-{cloudletType}–1.0.json`, `update-nimbus_policy_version-{cloudletType}–1.0.json`, and `match_rule-{cloudletType}–1.0.json`.

additionalDescription.description: Cloudlet-specific information for the JSON schema.

description.description: A description of when the JSON schema is applied.

location.description: The network path for the JSON schema.

title.description: The title of the JSON schema: `CREATE POLICY`, `UPDATE POLICY VERSION`, `CLONE POLICY`, `CREATE/CLONE POLICY VERSION`, `UPDATE POLICY VERSION`, or `{cloudletType} MATCH RULE`.

version.description: The specific version of the JSON schema.
